Translations.Text: O Infans Israel remember My favor ego bestowed vos fulfill tuus part covenant ut ego fulfill My part covenant reverence Me
Vos believe in quod ego revealed hic affirmavit quod vos habet; est primus reject it Non trade away My revelations cheap price observe Me
Non confound truth falsehood nor shall vos conceal truth knowingly
Vos observe Contact Prayers (Salat) dedit obligatory charity (Zakat) bow down those bow down
Vos exhort people perfecit est righteous dum forgetting yourselves vos read scripture? Vos non understand
Vos seek help steadfastness Contact Prayers (Salat)! Hoc est difficult indeed non ita pro the reverent
Qui believe they meet their Dominus; ut to Eum they ultimately return
